entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
